channel.title: Simplicity is a form of art... - draw

item.title: My application base: draw.io
item.description: The next few weeks (months even) will be challenging my free time as I'm working on (too many) projects simultaneously (sadly, only a few of those are free software related, most are house renovations). But that shouldn't stop me from starting a new set of posts, being my application base â€¦
